item.title: Comment on Effective Altruists and finance theory by hnau
item.description:
Zvi Mowshowitz has an Emergent Ventures grant and many MR links. He isn't an EA but he's definitely a "rationality type" and buys into "AI doom" arguments, and he also has extensive knowledge of finance. Tyler is well aware of all of this.

Exercise for Tyler: how does he think Zvi would respond to this post? What arguments would he make to Zvi for not expecting AI doom? And why isn't he making *those* arguments here, instead of setting up a straw man?

As a certain economist once said: I would say that to ask such questions is to answer them...
